CustomField.description: Concatenation of notice type and state from permit object to display in Gantt tooltip. This is as part of SFS-1401.
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_NoticeType__c), "00", "No Notice Required", "01", "Major", "02", "Standard", "03","Minor", "04","Immediate - Urgent", "05","Immediate - Emergency", "" ) + "-" + CASE(TEXT(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_NoticeState__c), "NNSE", "Notice Not Sent", "NSEN", "Notice Sent", "NSIT", "Notice Sent Initial", "NTBS","Notice To Be Sent", "" )
CustomField.label: Notice Type And State
